explains: v. 再次检查；重新考虑；（律）复问（己方证人）

sentences.cn: 再次检验下你对效能的定义。

sentences.en: Three new works re-examine what happened for contemporary readers.
sentences.cn: 三本新著再次为当代读者审视了当时的情况。

sentences.en: Re-examine assumptions about scholarship and the roles of researchers.
sentences.cn: 重新审视对学术的假设和研究人员的作用。
